editAccount.errorUpdatingAccount: There was an issue updating your account. Please try again later.

emailVerification.defaultError: Something went terribly wrong. Please try again.
emailVerification.emailSent: Verification email has been sent successfully.
emailVerification.emailUnverifiedMessage: Your email is unverified! Check for an email from ShieldBattery. If you don't see one, we can <2>send another</2>.
emailVerification.invalidCodeError: Error: The provided email or verification code is not valid. If the verification code matches the one you were emailed, it may have expired. Please request a new verification email and try again.
emailVerification.loggedOutError: Error: You need to be logged in to verify your email. Please log in by clicking the button below and try again.
emailVerification.resendSuccess: A new verification code has been sent to your account's email address.
emailVerification.sendError: Something went wrong while sending a verification email, please try again later.
emailVerification.title: Verify email
emailVerification.verifySuccess: Your email has been successfully verified.
emailVerification.wrongUserError: Error: You must be logged into the account whose email you want to verify. Please switch users by clicking the button below and try again.

password.successMessage: If that email address and username match a registered account, you should receive an email in the next few minutes with instructions on how to reset your password.
password.title: Reset password

user.enterEmail: Please enter the email address you signed up with.
user.successMessage: If there are any users registered to that email address, you should receive an email in the next few minutes with the relevant usernames.
user.title: Recover your username

noPermissionsPage.body: You don't have enough permissions to access this page.

signup.ageConfirmation: I certify that I am 13 years of age or older
signup.readAndAgree: I have read and agree to the
signup.title: Create account

userErrorDisplay.accountBanned: This account has been banned.<1><0>Reason:</0><1>{{banReason}}</1></1><2>The ban will expire at {{expireTime}}.</2>
userErrorDisplay.machineBanned: This machine is banned from creating new accounts.
userErrorDisplay.noConnectionErrorMessage: Failed to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
userErrorDisplay.suspiciousActivity: Due to suspicious activity detected on this network, creating accounts on the web is currently disabled. Please download the standalone client to create a new account.
userErrorDisplay.usernameTaken: A user with that name already exists

results.errorLoading: There was a problem loading this game.

topLinks.changeLanguageError: Something went wrong when changing the language
